headline: PPG STEELGUARD 652 Fire Protection Launched in North America
summary: PPG Industries launches STEELGUARD 652 in North America, a water-based intumescent coating, delivering up to two hours of fire protection for structural steel.

raw.headline: PPG STEELGUARD 652 Fire Protection Launched in North America
raw.summary: PPG Industries launches STEELGUARD 652 in North America, a water-based intumescent coating, delivering up to two hours of fire protection for structural steel.

headline: Are Basic Materials Stocks Lagging  Albemarle (ALB) This Year?
summary: Here is how Albemarle (ALB) and Buenaventura (BVN) have performed compared to their sector so far this year.

headline: ESI Wraps Up Micromax Acquisition, Boosts Electronics Portfolio
summary: ESI completes Micromax acquisition using new credit facilities, boosting its electronics portfolio as Micromax posts high-single-digit growth in 2025.
